resources.string: When using the photo picker below, pictures will be copied into the application’s internal storage. If you make subsequent changes to your pictures directory they won’t be reflected in the app, you must use this file picker to add new photos.
Are you sure you want to delete all photos from the digital album? This action cannot be undone.
Number of photos: %1$d\n\nNote: Currently this number doesn’t update until you re-enter the settings menu.
Allow the app to automatically collect crash reports via Firebase Crashlytics (a service operated by Google)
You can copy-paste the coordinates from Google Maps, or use the button below to prefill based on your device\’s GPS data.
For the best location accuracy, please enable GPS and Network location in your device settings. This should be named Google Location Accuracy on most devices, make sure it is turned on.

Thank you using Android Digital Frame!

The app is still in active development, so bugs and breaking changes are to be expected.

Learn more by visiting the project\’s page by pressing the button below:
These logs are collected to help with development. They will never be sent without user consent and explicit user approval.

We value your privacy and strive to provide a stable and reliable app experience. To help us identify and fix issues that may cause the app to crash, we use Firebase Crashlytics, a Google owned service that collects anonymous crash reports.

Crash reporting collects data only when the app unexpectedly crashes or encounters a critical error. No personally identifiable information is collected, and data is not shared with any third parties.

You have full control over this feature and can easily disable it at any time from the app\’s Settings.
